articles.author: Tom West
articles.title: Diablo IV post-launch content and Battle Pass prices revealed - TrueAchievements
articles.description: Blizzard has revealed the post-launch plans it has for Diablo IV after it launches on Xbox next month, which includes Seasons, three Battle Pass options, and the content found via the in-game shop.
articles.content: As with any live-service game, players have been wondering about Blizzard's plans for supporting Diablo IV after it launches on Xbox Series X|S and Xbox One on June 6th. After the debacle with Diablo… [+2571 chars]
